summary: The Forbidden Set (Oblivion Port for Females) Standalone v1.0
descriptionHtml:
===============================================================
 The Forbidden Set (Oblivion Port for Females) Standalone v1.0
===============================================================
From ali213 mod team

This is the standalone version of Nightywnd\'s armor ported by Whitewulff. My permission is given by Whitewulff, who has gotten the appropriate permissions for the conversion of this armor. Credits go to the original author Nightwynd and Whitewulff for the porting work.

My first mod for skyrim. Great thanks to tkwlee, who gave me solutions on item display fixes.

=============
Installation
=============

Using NMM: standard method, download and activate, that\'s it.

Manual install: \"esp\" goes to the the \\data\\ folder, \"meshes\" folder merges with \\data\\meshes\\, \"texture\" folder merges with \\data\\textures\\, and don\'t forget to check your data files via your Skyrim launcher.

To uninstall, simply delete installed files.

==============
How to obtain
==============

Two different versions, light and heavy. All pieces are craftable (under ebony crafting, ebony perk required), improvable (benefits from ebony perk) and enchantable. They are all seperated armor pieces. Since no helmet in this set, the armor ratings for the light version are close to Dragonscale sets, and heavy version are close to daedric sets. 

Another way you can get them is via console:

xx001003 light chest
xx001004 light boots
xx001005 light gloves
xx00100c heavy chest
xx00100d heavy boots
xx00100e heavy gloves
(xx is your loading index number)

===============
Version History
===============

v1.0: Initial version, seperate armor pieces, re-paint skin weights, fix armor display issues, etc.

==============
Final notes
==============

I am working on the Weight slider and bouncing breasts, should be available on later versions. Please report any bugs,leave comments/suggestions, and have fun.
author: Nokianokia
